Robel:
After the death of Ramona his soul took Siha, and the body bequest went to the Giants. They say that the Giants have absorbed part of the body of Ramona and received the ability to fly.
The remaining parts they gave to the earth. And accelerated this movement flightless guns Spicules.
Today we call Ramona these Moving Clods. Ramona you can use after Rebirth, when You have a force of Giants.
